words.name: fly
words.meaning: to move through the air using wings.

words.name: fire
words.meaning: a state, process, or instance of combustion in which fuel or other material is ignited and combined with oxygen, giving off light, heat, and flame.

words.name: hurricane
words.meaning: a violent, tropical, cyclonic storm of the western North Atlantic, having wind speeds of or in excess of 72 miles per hour 32 m/sec.

words.name: volcano
words.meaning: a vent in the earth's crust through which lava, steam, ashes, etc., are expelled, either continuously or at irregular intervals.

words.name: boy
words.meaning: a male child, from birth to full growth, especially one less than 18 years of age.

words.name: sane
words.meaning: free from mental derangement; having a sound, healthy mind: a sane person.

words.name: glide
words.meaning: to move smoothly and continuously along, as if without effort or resistance, as a flying bird, a boat, or a skater.

words.name: deliberate
words.meaning: carefully weighed or considered; studied; intentional: a deliberate lie.

words.name: weight
words.meaning: the amount or quantity of heaviness or mass; amount a thing weighs.
